name: 5th Edition of Euro-Global Conference on Food Science and Technology
content: Magnus Group is excited to announce its upcoming conference, the 5th Edition of Euro-Global Conference on Food Science and Technology, also known as FAT 2023\. The event is scheduled to take place from September 11-13, 2023, in Valencia, Spain, and will be conducted in a hybrid format, allowing participants to attend both on-site and virtually. The conference theme, "FOOD: Focusing On Outstanding Discoveries in Food Science and Technology," aims to bring together experts in the field of food science and technology to exchange innovative ideas, knowledge, and research findings in food . The primary objective of this food science congress is to create a platform where food chemist and biotechnologists and industry professionals can collaborate and promote experimentation to advance progress in the food science meeting.The food conference 2023 is open to a diverse group of attendees, including experienced food chemist and professionals and budding scientists. Participants will have the opportunity to showcase their original research through food science events , enabling them to gain valuable feedback from colleagues while attending foodscience hybrid events 2023 and expand their knowledge in food science. In addition to the Foodscience conference , there will be ample opportunities for networking, idea-sharing, and collaboration. Attendees can connect with like-minded individuals, create new partnerships, and explore potential research collaborations. The food science conference 2023 promises to be an excellent opportunity for attendees to learn, grow, and contribute to the advancement of food science and technology.We cordially invite you to join us at Food science conference 2023 and be a part of this exciting food science webinar .Your participation and contributions are crucial to the success of this Foodscience conference, and we look forward to welcoming you to Valencia, Spain, in September 2023\. Reach us at: Contact Email: food@scientific-meetings.com Phone: +1 (702) 988-2320 WhatsApp: +1 779-429-2143 Dates: September 11- 13, 2023 Venue: Olympia Hotel, Events & Spa Carrer Mestre Serrano, 5, 46120 Alboraia, Valencia, Spain Website https://food-chemistry-technology-conferences.magnusgroup.org/ Abstract submission: https://food-chemistry-technology-conferences.magnusgroup.org/submit-abstract Registration https://food-chemistry-technology-conferences.magnusgroup.org/register Social Media Link: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Foodscienceconference/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/foodscienceconf YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Food Science Conferences | Food Science Conference | Food Technology Conferences | Food Science Conferences 2023 | Food Science Conference 2023 | Food Technology Conferences 2023 | Food Science Conference | Food Science Conferences | Food Technology Conference | Food Science Conference 2023 | Food Science Conferences 2023 | Food Technology Conference 2023| Food Technology Conference| Food Technology Conferences 2023| Food Chemistry 2023| Food Science Congress| Food Science Meetings| Food Science Events| Food Science Summit| Online Food Science Conferences| Virtual Food Science Conferences| Food Science Webinars| Food Science Hybrid Events| FAT 2023| Food Technology Congress
